Other Names and/or Listed subspecies:: Manis tricuspis, Three-cusped Pangolin, Tree Pangolin
Area(s) Where Listed As Endangered:: Angola, Benin, Cameroon, Central African Republic, Cote d'Ivoire, Democratic Republic of Congo (Zaire), Equatorial Guinea, Gabon, Ghana, Kenya, Liberia, Nigeria, Republic of Congo, Rwanda, Sierra Leone, Sudan, Tanzania, Togo, Uganda, Zambia

Other Names and/or Listed subspecies:: Nubian Wild Ass (Equus africanus africanus), Somali Wild Ass (Equus africanus somaliensis)
Cape Hunting Dog, African Painted Wolf, Painted Hunting Dog

Area(s) Where Listed As Endangered:: Burundi, Democratic Republic of Congo (Zaire), Uganda

Other Names and/or Listed subspecies:: Bale Mountains Grivet, Djam-djam, Cercopithecus aethiops ssp. djamdjamensis

Area(s) Where Listed As Endangered:: Djibouti, Ethiopia, Kenya, Somalia, Sudan, Tanzania

Other Names and/or Listed subspecies:: Black And Rufous Sengi, Zanj Elephant Shrew

Area(s) Where Listed As Endangered:: Cameroon, Equatorial Guinea, Gabon, Republic of Congo

Other Names and/or Listed subspecies:: 4 subspecies endangered: South-central B. Rhinoceros (Diceros bicornis minor), South-western B. Rhinoceros (Diceros bicornis bicornis), E. African B. Rhinoceros (Diceros bicornis michaeli), W. African B. Rhinoceros (Diceros bicornis longipes)
